QuestData.Title: Aiding the Wharf
QuestData.Description: We have read the tides, and never before have I seen them in such turmoil. They call to the tidesages, begging for help.$b$bA debilitating sickness is running rampant amongst the villagers, and it comes from the sea.$b$bWe are but few. There is only so much we can do!$b$bPlease, take this list and gather the listed reagents from around the pier while I attempt to calm these folks. I should be able to create a tonic that will help.$b$bI hope.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Satchel of Seaweed, a Bundle of Vellum, and some Seal Blubber from around Anglepoint Wharf.
QuestData.CompletionText: My day-to-day job usually just consists of blessing the ships, reading the waters, finding the best spots to fishпїЅ$b$bI fear that this may be out of my league.
QuestData.RewardText: No seaweed? This will not do at all!
